desc:
There is a gap between prototyping and turning the prototype into a product. In this gap, the prototype needs to be turned into a reality and there are many methods that can be used to do so.

Rapid prototyping is one of these methods that have been adopted by many companies to solve this gap between prototype and product. This process can be also called as rapid application development or rapid software development. It is basically the idea of using prototypes as design tools for figuring out how something will work before going on to create an actual product.
